forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
Can you specify at what point it did not work for you.  

Can you prepare the stick ?  
Can you boot from the stick and do you get the boot.ini Menu ?  

Automatic Formatting the stick on first use, I think this will not occur.

forumNotes.author: kalipa
forumNotes.content:
Ok, I got it working now, using a different usb.  

Note that smart usb sticks dont work for this. It was made a boot stick, but when I pluged it in and chose boot from usb, all I got was a black screen.
